website_summaries.verdict: Great across-the-board overview for those needing to prepare for the ACT, all at a very low price point.
pros: Good advice on creating the best study plan
More than 2,000 practice questions between book and CD-ROM
Provides advice for best ways to take the test, to work through questions faster, and to deal w/test anxiety
cons: Organization of the book is lacking
Some questions in book seem to be out of date

customer_reviews.title: Good for Review
customer_reviews.text: Barron’s is a good review series. This book does not disappoint and will give you a solid review of the material on the ACT. If you do well on these practice tests you can expect to do very well on the ACT
customer_reviews.author: William Q. Mccreery

customer_reviews.title: Barron's review
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Barron's for decades for testing. My students love it, and without a doubt, it is the most comprehensive test book out there!
customer_reviews.author: karen constantine

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Well, if your child is serious about the ACT, I recommend this book. If your child is like my child then no amount of books will make a difference! Just because it wasn’t right for my child doesn’t mean it isn’t a great study aid. It’s a good purchase. Even if you are unsure if a book is the right study aid or not, the value of this one is worth finding out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: A must for students who want to do well on the ACT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My kid thought this was very helpful and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used already with stains
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with coffee stains and marks. It was used. I bought a new item
customer_reviews.author: Ottavia Zwillenberg

customer_reviews.title: ACT Prep study guide
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read and understand, valuable information and insight, well-worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dalphine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I just got the book but The cover of the book is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We have an older version of this book, 2nd edition I think. I was expecting this book to have updated their practice tests. The first test is identical to a test in the 2nd edition. I have to investigate the book further to know if it is worth keeping. I may be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Bendixsen

customer_reviews.title: Good study guide that is helping to improve and prepare
customer_reviews.text: Barron's ACT with Online Tests We have been using these as a way to help with preparing for the test for the past couple of years. Several in this house will be taking this test soon or have already taken the ACT. So we have been making use of so much information we gain from working with this book. The tests that come in it help us to know where someone needs to work more in one area or the other. Overall has been a great study guide for our family.
customer_reviews.author: 💜I Love Jellybeans

customer_reviews.title: Very comprehensive and thorough guide to ACT
customer_reviews.text: Wow - big scary book but I suppose ACT is a big scary test. My daughter's a high school sophomore and college fever will be here all too soon. She just took a combined practice SAT / ACT today. This book will be invaluable to help her prepare - odds are she'll take both tests. Luckily she tests well but there is still so much material to master. This book is extremely through and well organized. It does a great job of covering all the subjects. it has 6 full length practice tests and additional online tests. I know we'll find this book invaluable.
customer_reviews.author: spanakopita NJ

customer_reviews.title: 100% identical with the previous edition
customer_reviews.text: I had this edition, the fourth, and the previous one, the third, both from my local library. I compared them side by side and they seem to be 100% identical. The newer is thicker only because it is printed on thicker paper. The only differences I could find are the front and back covers and the price. Go for the third edition and save some money.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wolf

customer_reviews.title: ACT prep at it's finest
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this book for a co-worker's daughter. She was thoroughly impressed with the online practice testing portions and the general layout of the book. The questions are pretty detailed with multiple choice responses available to choose from. The answers and explanations are helpful for students to rationalize future responses. She hasn't taken the test yet but she does feel more confident in her selections.
customer_reviews.author: Markia

customer_reviews.title: Good primer for HS students
customer_reviews.text: We are hosting an exchange student from Taiwan who is interested in attending college in the U.S. as well. WE got her this book to help give her some idea of how to prepare for the ACT. So far she has found it very helpful especially as someone who did the bulk of their schooling in another country. She will be using it to prep for the ACT later this year before she goes back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great test prep
customer_reviews.text: I know many people who are sending their kids to tutors or classes to prep for the SAT and ACT, but I feel that these "work at home" books are much better for my schedule. There are many sample tests and there are also more tests available online. The book may seem dauntingly thick when you first receive it, sometimes getting started is the hardest part. After you've actually sat down and started working through it you find that its pretty simple and straightforward. Even easy.
customer_reviews.author: Just Trying to Help

customer_reviews.title: ACT Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: A good study guide for the ACTs with plenty of helpful test tips as well as general instruction in what will be tested on the ACT test. Practice tests are especially useful to get an idea of how the test will be structured.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: well done study guide
customer_reviews.text: I selected this book for my high schooler. I’m not sure if the act or the sat will be the way to go but I’d like to be prepared either way. The book itself is a straightforward basic study guide. It walks you through sample questions and explains the technique for deducing the correct answer. The sample tests are invaluable and more are available online.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great study guild
customer_reviews.text: The Barron's ACT is a great study guide. It provides practice and tips for ACT success. I also like the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Hofstetter

customer_reviews.title: Good reference for HS students
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids to be aware of the difference in ACT versus SAT tests. They have thumbed through it but haven’t tried the online tests.
customer_reviews.author: Becs

customer_reviews.title: Best study guide
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this to prep for her ACT. She said it was a good tool to use and liked that it had online practice tests. She felt prepared when she went to take the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Lawtooth

customer_reviews.title: Great prep books!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these before and they're great aids in getting your best scores! I would recommend these books very highly!
customer_reviews.author: IHeartAmazon

product_meta.title: Barron's ACT, 3rd Edition: With Bonus Online Tests (Barron's Test Prep)
